predicate.note: Frames file for 'dare' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. Comparison to urge.

example.name: linked impelled agent
example.text: The Conservatives don't dare *trace* jeopardize marginal Tory seats in Coventry, where Jaguar has headquarters...
example.arg: jeopardize marginal Tory seats in Coventry, where Jaguar has headquarters
example.note: The trace and the "jeopardize..." clause are correctly joined under a single S node.

example.name: with unlinked impelled agent
example.text: John dared Mary to kiss him.
